solution_line_template: 1/2 the age of Alvin who is {alvin_age} is {alvin_age}/{half_age_divisor} = <<{alvin_age}/{half_age_divisor}={half_alvin_age}>>{half_alvin_age}
Simon is {years_away} years away from being half the age of Alvin so Simon is {half_alvin_age}-{years_away} = <<{half_alvin_age}-{years_away}={simon_age}>>{simon_age} years old
